column5: Went out of the east from colgroves camp.had two follow boats.caught a lot of walleyes despite the big mayfly hatch going on.baysxwere 70 degress.walleys were a little slower in the morning but as the day went by tgey started getting more aggressive and easier to catch.half peices of worms were the best.so it seemed.had to fight through big schools of perch to get at the walleyes.fished some shallow humps and seemed to bigger fish were on them.for anybody coming up next week betterbring your mayfly tackle.lol.good luck.
